label: 仮玳瑁
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 56th  . Nara National Museum . 2004
説明文: Technique used to imitate of tortoiseshell, such as painting over a gold-leaf ground. A number of objects in the Shōsō-in have been decorated in imitation of imported artifacts that were hard to obtain. [正倉院]
